Text:
This collection can also be downloaded from the following locations:
(remove * from the links below!)

http://www.sling*file.com/file/l7qVI7l9JE
OR
http://deposit*files.com/files/haf8dhawh
Never trust .RAR files from an anonymous source.

Might be a good idea to offer this as an open or broken down set so people can pick and choose. For example, there a couple of volumes here I might want, but a bunch I either have or don't really want.
Why RAR? All you are doing is adding a load to the internet with users downloading a bunch of stuff they don't want to get a few things they would like to have.
